p1: Check out the exciting new changes to our rewards program! Now there are new opportunities and faster ways to earn points!
p2: At Guillotine Salon & Spa we want to give back to our guests to let them know how much we appreciate them! We have designed a program just for you to reward your loyalty to us. Appreciation Points are tracked electronically through our database and may be redeemed when you reach 10,000 points. You may use your points for future service or product purchases, or on a gift card to give to a friend or family member.
